paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on breast cancer in multiple ethnic regions of China.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among 6 of BRCA-related tumors, three BRCA1- and one BRCA2-associated tumors were in triple negative status.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is a deletion that likely results in a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in a Kazakh ethnic Chinese patient.
key_quotes: BRCA2 variants 6873delCTCC and 9481delA (both are Kazakh ethnic Chinese), were identified and they had never been reported in breast cancer information core (BIC) database before.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among 6 of BRCA-related tumors, three BRCA1- and one BRCA2-associated tumors were in triple negative status.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is a deletion that likely results in a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in a Kazakh ethnic Chinese patient.
key_quotes: BRCA2 variants 6873delCTCC and 9481delA (both are Kazakh ethnic Chinese), were identified and they had never been reported in breast cancer information core (BIC) database before.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: BRCA2 1627A-T (K467X) was previously reported in a Korean population and identified as recurrent mutation in the Korean population.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is a nonsense mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in a Han ethnic Chinese patient.
key_quotes: BRCA2 1627A-T (K467X) was previously reported in a Korean population and identified as recurrent mutation in the Korean population.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of BRCA1 and BRCA2 mutations identified in the study.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
